name: Contact Draw: Bowling
description:
We heard your opinion about Contact Draw: football and did everything in the best traditions - hardcore, tears and pain.
Another ball, another goal and again 90 levels of different complexity, using different mechanics and logic of passage. Compete against other players by means of the steam leader board.

Get achievements for each level passed, as well as collect coins at the level to receive additional achievements with symbols and letters.

Management in the game | Hotkeys

[CTRL] - Start level again (Restart level)
[SPACE] - Continue (Next level)
[ENTER] - Return to the main menu (Home)
